flawed_nl_solution:
Sidney does 20 on Monday + 36 on Tuesday + 40 on Wednesday + 50 on Thursday = <<20+36+40+50=146>>146 jumping jacks.
Brooke does 3 x 146 = <<3*146=483>>483 jumping jacks.
#### 483

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 438, not 483. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
